channel.title: Looking for a Codec & Monster Drops
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Looking for a Codec & Monster Drops" - But I'm not holding my breath about the drops...

item.title: Re: Looking for a Codec & Monster Drops
item.content:encoded: Are you still willing to trade for a code?

item.title: Re: Looking for a Codec & Monster Drops
item.content:encoded:
Been awhile with no response, soâ€¦ how's about this: I'll trade the K-Dog's Headband & the Stealth Suit for a Codec? Fair enough, right?

All done.

item.title: Looking for a Codec & Monster Drops
item.content:encoded:
Greetings All,

Have

Stealth Suit
K-Dog's Headband
Food Pills(86)
Glowing Goo(2)
Super Potion(2)
Fur Sqaure(31)
Sticky Thread(21)
Dark Water(1)
Dayshade(3)
Nightshade(1)

Want

Codec
Monster Drops(Other than Firebrand, Kaiju Momento, Carapace Armor, Poisoned Daggers, & Regalia)

Mostly just expecting someone willing to trade for a Codec, since that's just a Party House rare.

I'd add the Halloween Items to my want list, but I'm trying to be realistic. I've seen a few people trade low level monster drops for Smoke Bombs, so if you're one of them, offer away ^_^

Same name in-game, Aemoh.
